alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 27 at 9:24AM CDT until March 27 at 10:30AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Jackson County in southern Mississippi... * Until 1030 AM CDT. * At 923 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Latimer, or 8 miles northeast of St. Martin, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Moss Point, St. Martin, Escatawpa, Gautier, D`iberville, Wade, Latimer, Big Point, Helena, Gulf Hills, Hurley, Vancleave and Hickory Hills. This includes Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 48 and 76. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
